coreAttributes.name: crotchless chaps
coreAttributes.description: These leather chaps are missing a large piece at the front and back, which leaves the wearer's ass and groin completely exposed.

replacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(step)] into the crotchless chaps, before pulling them up to fit around [npc.her] waist.
replacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(get)] [npc2.name] to step into the crotchless chaps, before pulling them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.
replacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(force)] [npc2.name] to step into the crotchless chaps, before yanking them up to fit around [npc2.her] waist.

displacementText.self: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc.her] crotchless chaps, before slipping them off.
displacementText.other: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] crotchless chaps, before slipping them off.
displacementText.otherRough: [npc.Name] roughly [npc.verb(pull)] down [npc2.namePos] crotchless chaps, before yanking them off.
